name: Rhythm-Python
description:
Roll out! You are trapped in a tank, a pet, a victim of love. Your owner however has left mice in the tank that are to large to eat, and you must avoid them for as long as you can.

We were spinning the idea of a 2D game called Geometry Dash, the snake is meant to dodge the threats as they appear with the music. 

This was made for the 48 hour Mix and Jam challenge.
